name: Union City Chamber of Commerce
short_desc: A private, voluntary, not-for-profit organization of business and professional people dedicated to improving the economic environment of Union City. Fosters business growth and prosperity.
description: A private, voluntary, not-for-profit organization of business and professional people dedicated to improving the economic environment of the Union City community and fostering the development of business growth and prosperity. Offers business support, networking opportunities and legislative advocacy.
